grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 契約【ケイヤク】contract, compact, agreement
契機【ケイキ】opportunity, chance, trigger, cause
幽契【ユウケイ】secret promise made to the gods
黙契【モッケイ】implicit agreement, tacit understanding
kun reading compounds: 契る【ちぎる】to pledge, to vow, to promise, to swear, to have sexual intercourse (esp. between husband and wife), to share a bed
